name: ThunderUserbot - By Thundergang
description: Best telegram Userbot, Made with love

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value from string generator by Thundergang.

CUSTOM_PMPERMIT.description: Leave this as it is! Don't edit or change
CUSTOM_PMPERMIT.value: Do not spam here !!, otherwise you will be blocked automatically.

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Put your github access token(Not Mandatory).

SUDO_HNDLR.description: Used to sudo commands, leave blank for default .Note, Only set sudo when thunderuserbot support says, else leave it as it is

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: Needed for Lydia AI. Visit https://coffeehouse.intellivoid.net/ to get your API.(Not Mandatory)

CHROME_BIN.description: Leave as such, Google Chrome (or) Chromium binary location for selenium based modules.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: Leave as such, ChromeDriver location for selenium based modules

SUDO_USERS.description: Only fill this when thundergang or support users says otherwise leave it as it is.

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: Make a private group and add rose bot (@MissRose_bot) there and make him admin, then for getting group id put /id command note than and put here and below

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline mode. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the token of your bot.

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline mode. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the username of your bot.

MAX_SPAM.description: No. of messages one can send in your PM before being approved. By default, it is setted to 3.

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: Required for OCR functionality. Get from https://ocr.space/ocrapi(Not Mandatory)

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: Required for Removing image background functionality. Get from https://www.remove.bg/ (Not Mandatory)

ALIVE_PIC.description: telegra.ph link to the image you want as your alive pic, (Don't change it)

PMPERMIT_PIC.description: telegra.ph link to the image you want as pmpermit pic, leave blank for default (Don't change it)

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time on autopic/get time. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc
